items.Name: Brennan 'Ares' Combat Bike(Gunpod Military only/sold without for 17500eb)
Off-Road Capability
items.Notes: Can be operated off-road at 1/3 top on-road speed;

items.Name: Civilian Environment Cont.
items.Notes: Controls heat; humidity; but no filters or gas protection;

items.Name: Life Support System
items.Notes: 4 man hours; air and water tight;

items.Name: Military Radio
items.Notes: 500km; only jammed on a 1D10 roll of 4-10;

items.Name: Satellite Uplink
items.Notes: Can uplink directly to a commo satellite;

items.Name: Cybernetic Linkage
items.Notes: +2 to control and combat rolls; -1 per extra action;

items.Name: ECM 100m
items.Notes: Jams civilian radar and radio automatically; for;

items.Name: ECM 500m
items.Notes: Military radar and radio roll 1D10/turn; 4-10: jammed;

items.Name: ECM 1000m
items.Notes: Also jams radar-guided missiles; +15 difficulty to hit;

items.Name: Shocker Security System
items.Notes: Plus stun to 6D6 shock damage. (20/25+ Elec.Security);

items.Name: Halogen Headlights
items.Notes: Same effect as spots except mounted straight forward;

items.Name: External Vidcam
items.Notes: Wide-angle video camera. 245 hours of recording;

items.Name: Winch System
items.Notes: 100m cable and winch that can pull up to 15tons; 30SDP;

items.Name: Chute
items.Notes: Deceleration of 75mph. Skill roll of 15+ to control;

items.Name: Ram
items.Notes: Adds one point of Penetration to ramming attacks;

items.Name: Homing Beacon/Tracer
items.Notes: 5km. Jammed by ECM; roll 1D10/turn 3-10 signal lost;

items.Name: Light Amplification
items.Notes: Negates darkness modifiers and polarizing dampers;

items.Name: Magnetometer
items.Notes: Detects large masses of metal within 200m;

items.Name: Microwave Detector
items.Notes: Detects focused microwaves 90% of the time;

items.Name: Look-Down Radar
items.Notes: Detects aircraft less than 200m above the ground;

items.Name: Terrain-Following Radar
items.Notes: Allows detection of obstacles in darkness/by autopilot;

items.Name: Thermal Imaging
items.Notes: Negate darkness penalties. See through walls at 10m;

items.Name: Autoloader
items.Notes: A robotic autoloader reduces gun crew to 1;

items.Name: Computer Sights +1
items.Notes: Must be installed on separate weapons;

items.Name: Visual Rangefinder
items.Notes: +1 to hit with all weapons except missiles;

items.Name: Radar Rangefinder
items.Notes: +2 to hit with all weapons except missiles;

items.Name: Laser Rangefinder
items.Notes: +2 to hit with all weapons except missiles;

items.Name: Microwave Rangefinder
items.Notes: +2 to hit with all weapons except missiles;

items.Name: Multi-target
items.Notes: Can fire radar or active missiles at 10 targets;

items.Name: Remote Targeting
items.Notes: Real-time link for use with a forward observer;

items.Name: Firing Port
items.Notes: Anything upto a LMG; -3 WA. -4 to hit port.;

items.Name: Jury-rigged Mount
items.Notes: 1 space weapon maximum; WA -2; one direction; exposed;

items.Name: Pintle Mount
items.Notes: 1 space max; full WA; traverse limited to room; exposed;

items.Name: Fixed Mount
items.Notes: Any size weapon; WA -1; one direction; behind armour;

items.Name: Articulated Mount
items.Notes: 2 spaces max; full WA; fire from one side; behind armour;

items.Name: Open Mount - 1 direction
items.Notes: WA -1; exposed; penetration in 10 chance of being damaged;

items.Name: Open Mount - rotate
items.Notes: Full WA; exposed; chance of being damaged as above;

items.Name: Turret
items.Notes: Full WA; can mount 1/3 rd of vehicle spaces in weapons; etc;

items.Name: High-Angle Traverse
items.Notes: Modifies turret/rotating open mount so they can shoot upward;

items.Name: Gas Jets
items.Notes: Fills passenger compartment or whole vehicle with gas;

items.Name: Bulletproof Seals
items.Notes: SP15 screen between passengers and driver;

items.Name: Auto-Return
items.Notes: Vehicle returns if driver reaches Mortal; Diff 25 to override;

items.Name: Auto-Weapons
items.Notes: Vehicle systems shut down if driver dies; Diff 30 to override;
